document_title: Kidney failure: Causes, signs, diagnosis and treatment
subsection_content: Kidney failure is a condition in which the kidneys lose function and are no longer able to filter waste products from the blood. This is the final stage of chronic kidney disease. Without dialysis or a kidney transplant, the patient will have difficulty maintaining life. (first)
subsection_title: suy than.json. What is kidney failure?
subsection_data:
suy than.json. What is kidney failure?
Kidney failure is a condition in which the kidneys lose function and are no longer able to filter waste products from the blood. This is the final stage of chronic kidney disease. Without dialysis or a kidney transplant, the patient will have difficulty maintaining life. (first)
